parameters.info: MS name
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: Number of subplot rows (default 1).
parameters.name: gridrows

parameters.info: Number of subplot columns
parameters.name: gridcols

parameters.info: Row location of the plot
parameters.name: rowindex

parameters.info: Column location of the plot
parameters.name: colindex

parameters.info: Index to address a subplot
parameters.name: plotindex

parameters.info: plot x-axis (blank for default/current)
parameters.name: xaxis

parameters.info: Plot y-axis (blank for default/current)
parameters.name: yaxis

parameters.info: which data column to use for Visibility values
parameters.name: xdatacolumn

parameters.info: which data column to use for Visibility values
parameters.name: ydatacolumn

parameters.info: Field names or field index numbers
parameters.name: field

parameters.info: Spectral windows:channels
parameters.name: spw

parameters.info: Time range (blank for all)
parameters.name: timerange

parameters.info: Uv range (blank for all)
parameters.name: uvrange

parameters.info: Antenna/baselines (blank for all)
parameters.name: antenna

parameters.info: Scan numbers (blank for all)
parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: Correlations (blank for all)
parameters.name: correlation

parameters.info: (sub)array numbers (blank for all)
parameters.name: array

parameters.info: Select data
parameters.name: selectdata

parameters.info: Select by observation ID(s)
parameters.name: observation

parameters.info: MS selection (blank for all)
parameters.name: msselect

parameters.info: Average data
parameters.name: averagedata

parameters.info: Average over channel?  (blank = False, otherwise value in channels)
parameters.name: avgchannel

parameters.info: Average over time? (blank = False, otherwise value in seconds)
parameters.name: avgtime

parameters.info: Only valid if time averaging is turned on.  average over scans?
parameters.name: avgscan

parameters.info: Only valid if time averaging is turned on.  average over fields?
parameters.name: avgfield

parameters.info: Average over all baselines?  (mutually exclusive with avgantenna)
parameters.name: avgbaseline

parameters.info: Average by per-antenna?  (mutually  exclusive with avgbaseline)
parameters.name: avgantenna

parameters.info: Average over all spectral windows?
parameters.name: avgspw

parameters.info: Do scalar averaging?
parameters.name: scalar

parameters.info: The frame in which to render frequency and velocity axes
parameters.name: freqframe

parameters.info: Rest frequency to use for velocity  conversions
parameters.name: restfreq

parameters.info: The definition in which to render velocity
parameters.name: veldef

parameters.info: Adjust phases by this phase center shift [dx,dy] (arcsec)
parameters.name: shift

parameters.info: Extend flags based on correlation?
parameters.name: extcorr

parameters.info: Extend flags based on channel?
parameters.name: extchannel

parameters.info: the axis over which to iterate
parameters.name: iteraxis

parameters.info: If true, iterated plots should share a common x-axis label per column.
parameters.name: xselfscale

parameters.info: If true, iterated plots should share a common y-axis label per row.
parameters.name: yselfscale

parameters.info: Plots should share a common x-axis.
parameters.name: xsharedaxis

parameters.info: Plots should share a common y-axis.
parameters.name: ysharedaxis

parameters.info: set a custom symbol(s) for unflagged points
parameters.name: customsymbol

parameters.info: shape of plotted unflagged symbols
parameters.name: symbolshape

parameters.info: size of plotted unflagged symbols
parameters.name: symbolsize

parameters.info: color of plotted unflagged symbols
parameters.name: symbolcolor

parameters.info: fill type of plotted unflagged symbols
parameters.name: symbolfill

parameters.info: selects outlining plotted unflagged points
parameters.name: symboloutline

parameters.info: selects which data to use for colorizing
parameters.name: coloraxis

parameters.info: set a custom plot symbol for flagged points
parameters.name: customflaggedsymbol

parameters.info: shape of plotted flagged symbols
parameters.name: flaggedsymbolshape

parameters.info: size of plotted flagged symbols
parameters.name: flaggedsymbolsize

parameters.info: color of plotted flagged symbols
parameters.name: flaggedsymbolcolor

parameters.info: fill type of plotted flagged symbols
parameters.name: flaggedsymbolfill

parameters.info: selects outlining plotted flagged points
parameters.name: flaggedsymboloutline

parameters.info: plot axes ranges: [xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax]
parameters.name: plotrange

parameters.info: Title written along top of plot
parameters.name: title

parameters.info: Text for horizontal axis. Blank for default.
parameters.name: xlabel

parameters.info: Text for vertical axis. Blank for default.
parameters.name: ylabel

parameters.info: Show major grid lines (horiz and vert.)
parameters.name: showmajorgrid

parameters.info: Line width in pixels of major grid lines
parameters.name: majorwidth

parameters.info: Major grid line style: solid dash dot none
parameters.name: majorstyle

parameters.info: Color as name or hex code of major grid lines
parameters.name: majorcolor

parameters.info: Show minor grid lines (horiz and vert.)
parameters.name: showminorgrid

parameters.info: Show a legend on the plot.
parameters.name: showlegend

parameters.info: Line width in pixels of minor grid lines
parameters.name: minorwidth

parameters.info: Line width in pixels of minor grid lines
parameters.name: minorstyle

parameters.info: Color as name or hex code of minor grid lines
parameters.name: minorcolor

parameters.info: Name of plot file to save automatically.
parameters.name: plotfile

parameters.info: Remove any existing plots so new ones can replace them.
parameters.name: clearplots

parameters.info: Export format type (jpg, png, ps, pdf, txt), if not provided, plotfile extension will be used
parameters.name: expformat

parameters.info: Export all iteration plots or only the current one
parameters.name: exprange

parameters.info: Overwrite exsting file
parameters.name: overwrite

parameters.info: Show gui
parameters.name: showgui
